commit message: README: links and updates
smackable: add google:queue support
service: toggle google:queue on service bind/unbind
roster: show presence error as status message.
service: remove unneeded methods

chat window: only bind/unbind if onPause/onResume also happened

The ChatWindow is using bindService to clean notifications as well as to
update google:queue status. onPause/onResume are not reliable because
these are called if a chat window is right behind the lockscreen.
onWindowFocusChanged is not reliable because it is called on popup
dialogs / context menu opening. Therefore, both are combined.
roster window: Properly handle newly delivered intents, fix #145
chat: implement /me formatting
Shorten ticker text to fit into one line (GNex)
chat: update nickname from roster DB as well
chat: improve click handling a little bit
status dialog: fix status RTL
MTM: pull latest updates (JUL, translations)
ABS: go from 4.4.0 to dev branch, fixes compilation with newer SDK
Move to using a CursorLoader in ChatWindow
Add screenSize to manifest, fix #154
first start dialog: improve Android 2.x and tiny screens
dialogs: fix EditText on 2.x
Remove 'cancel' from chat long-press menu. Half-fixes #157

Chat window updates

- Show a spinner during the loading of chats from the database
- When the user doesn't have any messages, show the software keyboard (if it already isn't showing)
Fix outgoing /me in private chats, fix #156
chat: Move Intent parsing in front of adapter creation
chat: queue and delay markAsRead DB updates
chat: fix Y2K problem, thx to enotep
